articles.author: KEIRAN SMITH Associated Press
articles.title: An Australian woman on trial for triple murder testifies over mushroom poisoning - ABC News
articles.description: The woman accused of murdering three members of her ex-husband’s family by serving them poisonous mushrooms has taken the stand at an Australian court on Monday as the highly publicized triple murder trial nears its conclusion
